REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A f0004 reute d f BC-U.S.-APPROVES-BUYOUT 03-02 0050

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. APPROVES BUYOUT OF COASTAL BANCORP <CSBK>
TEXT.BODY: Coastal Bancorp said the U.S. Federal Reserve Board approved the acquisition of Coastal by Suffield Financial Corp <SSBK>. The acquisition still requires approval from the Banking Department in Maine, the company noted. Reuter
